alert.note: Alert for Dundy; Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 17 at 5:23PM CST until January 17 at 10:00PM CST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST /10 PM CST/ THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Visibility down to a quarter mile or less in dense fog or even freezing fog. * WHERE...Portions of east central and northeast Colorado, northwest and west central Kansas and southwest Nebraska. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST /10 PM CST/ this evening. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Some areas are seeing temperatures at or below freezing, and may result in freezing fog. motorists should use caution on roadways and elevated surfaces like bridges and overpasses.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
